events.message: I received the wrong product and would like a refund. This is quite disappointing as I needed the correct item urgently.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back following receipt of an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah to handle the refund request and assist the customer promptly.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I'm here to help resolve your issue regarding the incorrect product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the mistake?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo showing that I got a different item than what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and the proposed refund. I appreciate your help sorting this out so fast.
The refund has been processed and a return label sent to your email. Please return the incorrect item at your earliest convenience.
Just following up to confirm that you received the refund and if you need any further assistance regarding the return process.
Yes, I received the refund. Everything has been handled smoothly. Thanks again for your assistance.
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on the support experience they received today.
